text: Brad and Ange are in the middle of a tense custody battle ( Picture : WireImage ) Tensions are reportedly high between estranged couple Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie. A new report alleges that Brad, 54, is worried that his ex - wife Angelina, 43, could move their six children abroad making it difficult for him to see them regularly. Brad and Angelina, who split in September 2016, are in the midst of a custody battle that is currently being played out in the courts. The Mail Online claim that the former couple are struggling to get on the same page and ‘ can ’ t agree on anything ’.
